o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_export_to_excel
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: BasBosman
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj)
' Log that we will start exporting. WriteInfo "Start exporting " & obj.Code
' Open & Create Excel Document Dim x1 ' Dim activeWorksheet Set x1 = CreateObject("Excel.Application") x1.Visible = True x1.Workbooks.Add
Dim attributeCount Dim exampleEntity Dim entityCount : entityCount = 0 For Each exampleEntity In obj.getExtendedCollection("mdde_ExampleEntityData") Dim entity : Set entity = exampleEntity.getExtendedCollection("mdde_ExampleEntity").Item(0) Dim exampleRecord Dim attributeHeader Dim recordCount : recordCount = 0 Dim headerCount Dim headerFound Dim headerAttr entityCount = entityCount + 1
' Create a new worksheet If entityCount = 1 Then Set activeWorksheet = x1.Worksheets(1) Else Set activeWorksheet = x1.Worksheets.Add End if activeWorksheet.Name = Left(entity.Code,31) x1.Cells(1,1).Value = entity.Code
' Write a row for each Example Record For each exampleRecord in exampleEntity.getExtendedCollection("mdde_ExampleRecords") Dim testAttribute recordCount = recordCount + 1 x1.Cells(recordCount + 1, 1).Value = exampleRecord.Code attributeCount = 0
If recordCount = 1 Then Set attributeHeader = exampleRecord.getExtendedCollection("mdde_ExampleAttributeValues") End if
For each testAttribute in exampleRecord.getExtendedCollection("mdde_ExampleAttributeValues") attributeCount = attributeCount + 1 If recordCount = 1 Then ' First test case: write header x1.Cells(1, attributeCount + 1).Value = testAttribute.Name x1.Cells(recordCount + 1, attributeCount + 1).Value = testAttribute.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_Value") Else ' Match Attribute with Header headerFound = false headerCount = 0 For each headerAttr in attributeHeader If testAttribute.Code = headerAttr.Code Then x1.Cells(recordCount + 1, headerCount + 2).Value = testAttribute.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_Value") headerFound = true Exit For End if headerCount = headerCount + 1 Next ' If header not found, add it If headerFound = false Then x1.Cells(1, headerCount + 2).Value = testAttribute.Name x1.Cells(recordCount + 1, headerCount + 2).Value = testAttribute.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_Value") attributeHeader.Add testAttribute End if End if Next Next
'If we do not have test cases, write attributes from entity if recordCount = 0 Then WriteInfo "No test records found" attributeCount = 0 Dim attribute For Each attribute In entity.Attributes attributeCount = attributeCount + 1 x1.Cells(1, attributeCount + 1).Value = attribute.Name Next End if Next End Sub
